trans-unit.resname: PL22·1 | Temur Sabertooth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{G}: You may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, CARDNAME gains indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {1}{G}: You may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, CARDNAME gains indestructible until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: PL22·3 | Snapdax, Apex of the Hunt | Card Name
PL22·3 | Snapdax, Apex of the Hunt | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Mutate {2}{B/R}{W}{W} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)\nDouble strike\nWhenever this creature mutates, it deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls and you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: Mutate {2}{B/R}{W}{W} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)\nDouble strike\nWhenever this creature mutates, it deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls and you gain 4 life.

trans-unit.resname: PL22·4 | Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow | Card Name
PL22·4 | Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Commander ninjutsu {U}{B} ({U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand or the command zone tapped and attacking.)\nWhenever a Ninja you control deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. Each opponent loses life equal to that card's mana value.
trans-unit.target: Commander ninjutsu {U}{B} ({U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand or the command zone tapped and attacking.)\nWhenever a Ninja you control deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. Each opponent loses life equal to that card's mana value.

trans-unit.resname: PL22·5 | Herald's Horn | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\nCreature spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card of the chosen type, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
trans-unit.target: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\nCreature spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card of the chosen type, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.
